idea: Boppo has successfully architected, created, implemented, and deployed agile, accelerated time-to-market business outcomes like custom software applications and mission-critical IT solutions for our customers. Our flexible, innovative, and reliable solutions in line with the fast-paced times help you capitalize on opportunities and respond to challenges effectively while encouraging better reach. Boppo Technologies delivers enterprise mobility solutions for SMEs, Start-ups, and full-grown enterprises in India and other parts of the world. Since inception, the focal point of our business has been to create profound value for our customers by crafting intelligent solutions and services in path-breaking and cost-effective ways. We provide cutting-edge platforms in the field of BI & Data Warehousing, Data Analytics, Cloud services, IoT, Analytics and QA, Mobile App and Custom Software Development, and Consulting Services for several business verticals like Retail, Healthcare, IT, Finance, Manufacturing, and Insurance among others.
name: BOPPO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are online designing tool enabling small/medium enterprises to fulfill their creative communication requirements specific to their business sector in the native language of their customers.


We are launching a Mobile application & Web model that helps customers with the below.


Regional typing, editing of text, numerous fonts in 8 regional languages: Hindi, Marathi, Gujarati, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bengali, Punjabi, other than the mainstream English language.


Indian Advertising sector specific templates catering to small businesses

Template that can adapt to brand guidelines


English to Regional translation


Services: Logo creation, FB/Instagram/Twitter post, YouTube thumbnail, WhatsApp DP, Poster, Leaflet, Menu, Invitation card, etc.
